intro-david-catuhe.md.title: Introducing David Catuhe
intro-david-catuhe.md.abstract: As a way of introducing our astonishing array of speakers, they have kindly agree to answer a few questions for us. Here is David Catuhe ('a 3D addict since the prehistoric age of computing'), who will show us how to do awesome 3D with nothing more than a modern browser!
